remarks: Move substitution into a class abstraction.  Version of ~ csbopab with a sethood antecedent but depending on fewer axioms.  (Contributed by NM, 6-Aug-2007.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 17-Nov-2016.) (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
csbopabgALT $p |- ( A e. V -> [_ A / x ]_ { <. y , z >. | ph } = { <. y , z >. | [. A / x ]. ph } ) $.
$d A y z $.
$d x y z $.
